resources.string: Diyaruna Foundation for Development is a voluntary, charitable development institution, officially established in 2020, aimed at development and social assistance to everyone in need on the beloved land of our Egypt. The Foundation aims to establish public and private development projects, construct water purification plants, construct and roof homes, a medical convoy, water meters, make food bags and cartons, hot feeding duties, medical operations, and all forms of humanitarian work.
Address / 5 Rawdat Al-Ahram Street - Old Al-Ahram Gardens - Al-Remaya Square - Giza landline / 0233762679 - Mobile / 01026855550 - 01020333398

Diyarna built the Diyarna app as a free app. this service is provided by Diyarna at no cost and is intended for use as is.
this page is used to inform visitors regarding our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use our Service.
